citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10 am to 10:40
am on March 30, 2022. During that time the inspector waited at the facility, called phone number on file leaving a
message, and left a flyer on door with contact information.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10 am to 10:40 
am on March 30, 2022. During that time the inspector waited at the facility, called phone number on file leaving a 
message, and left a flyer on door with contact information. 
 
 
 
End Section
